column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////There was a piece of glass in my food this afternoon...I chewed on it
column3: i fished around and found it - notified the waitress
column4: and she simply took it away.  We had to ask her to notify the manager
column5: she didnt do speak to him on her own and it took nearly 15 minutes for a manager to come over.  The situation was handled very poorly.  The meal was comped - but that wasnt the point.  Glass in your food is a pretty serious endictment
column6: and they handled it like it was not a big deal.
